title: Skydive Puerto Rico
description: $179 for a Parachute Jump for 1 Person; or $319 for Parachute Jump for 2 People; Both Options Include: 20% Discount from the Original Price for 1 Additional Person on the Same Day
fullDescription:
Skydive PR wants you to see Puerto Rico from the best available viewpoint! Parachuting and taking in your island will be a Gustazo™!

- The instructors have many years of experience, thousands of jumps, and are certified by the USPA (United States Parachute Association).
- Services are available for people who want to jump only once and for people who want to make it their hobby. 
- The tandem jump is the fastest, safest, and most convenient way to experience skydiving. 
- About 1 minute into free fall, the instructor will open the parachute and you’ll glide with the parachute for approximately 7-10 minutes.
- The instructor will take care of everything so you can enjoy the experience to the fullest.

For more information, visit: https://puertoricoskydive.com/
highlights: You get to fly over Puerto Rico.
